channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: #被抓获的索马里海盗抵达印度接受审判：海军
item.description:
#BREAKING Captured Somali pirates arrive in India for trial: navy pic.twitter.com/A6uYrM8MwN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 在东耶路撒冷，里姆-阿布-奥贝达（Rim Abu Obeida）正在接受癌症放射治疗，她焦急地等待着。她是生活在困境中的一群巴勒斯坦病人之一，以色列法院正在权衡是否可以在治疗结束后将他们送回加沙。
item.description:
In east Jerusalem where she received radiation therapy for cancer, Rim Abu Obeida waits anxiously.

She is among a group of Palestinian patients living in limbo while an Israeli court weighs if they can be sent back to Gaza now that their treatment is over https://t.co/IBvHaA8Rfs pic.twitter.com/4WMXFyGZ3m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 直到最近，前政府内部人士彼得-马扎尔（Peter Magyar）才被公众所熟知，他突然出现在匈牙利的政治舞台上，誓言要挑战资深民族主义总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）的 "权力工厂"。
item.description:
Largely unknown to the public until recently, former government insider Peter Magyar has burst onto the political scene in Hungary, vowing to challenge the "power factory" of veteran nationalist premier Viktor Orban https://t.co/4YUe7TctLE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 先是机枪扫射，然后是刺耳的惊恐尖叫，接着克罗克斯市政厅燃起熊熊大火。
item.description:
First there were rounds of machine gun fire, then piercing screams of panic and then the Crocus City Hall went up in flames.

Hundreds of fans had been at the hall north of Moscow for the concert before armed individuals entered and opened firehttps://t.co/vNjyBsxVb2 pic.twitter.com/ws5GLj9bgi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 根据一项提交给领导人峰会的计划，欧盟希望通过对进口到欧盟的谷物和相关产品征收 "禁止性关税"，"扼杀 "俄罗斯用于乌克兰战争的收入。
item.description:
The EU is looking to "choke off" revenue Russia uses for its war on Ukraine by slapping "prohibitive tariffs" on grain and related imports into the bloc, under a plan being put to a leaders summit https://t.co/FOfrZBU5lY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：墨西哥人聚集在墨西哥城郊外的特奥蒂瓦坎前西班牙时期的金字塔前，参加庆祝春分的传统活动
item.description:
VIDEO: Mexicans gather at the pre-Hispanic pyramids of Teotihuacan on the outskirts of Mexico City for a tradition that celebrates spring equinox pic.twitter.com/klHF73qYlN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 世界花样滑冰锦标赛周五的节奏舞比赛中，卫冕世界冰舞冠军的美国选手麦迪逊-乔克（Madison Chock）和埃文-贝茨（Evan Bates）夺冠
item.description:
Defending world ice dance champions Madison Chock and Evan Bates of the United States won Friday's rhythm dance at the World Figure Skating Championships https://t.co/50Djh91SRR pic.twitter.com/TZIdyUbZOf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 耐克在其主导国际足球业务的长期斗争中取得了最令人吃惊的胜利之一，他们击败了阿迪达斯，成为德国的球衣供应商。
item.description:
Nike scored one of the most surprising victories in their long battle to dominate international football business when they outbid Adidas to become Germany's kit supplier https://t.co/eIObtVK3jk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #俄罗斯媒体称莫斯科商场袭击事件估计造成 40 人死亡，100 人受伤
item.description:
#BREAKING 40 estimated dead, 100 injured in Moscow mall attack, Russian media says pic.twitter.com/ginPpMPDQ7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一个由地质学家组成的顶级专家小组在对 "人类时代 "开始的确切时间产生分歧后，决定不赋予 "人类时代 "在地球地质年表中的独特地位。
item.description:
A top panel of geologists has decided not to grant the 'human age' its own distinct place in Earth's geological timeline after disagreeing over when exactly our era might have begun https://t.co/2VdRNrfNpW pic.twitter.com/NJhK9zwlGc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 突发事件--在得知凯瑟琳王妃被诊断出癌症的 "可怕 "消息后，白宫@新闻发言人祝愿她早日康复
item.description:
Breaking - White House @PressSec wishes Princess Catherine swift recovery after 'terrible' news of cancer diagnosis

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) March 22, 2024

item.title: #威尔士王妃凯瑟琳宣布癌症诊断结果，令人震惊
item.description:
#BREAKING Catherine, Princess of Wales announces cancer diagnosis pic.twitter.com/0rznCAxTt3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 📷 瑞典滑雪运动员克里斯托弗-特德尔（Kristofer Turdell）在瑞士阿尔卑斯山举行的自由式滑雪世界巡回赛决赛韦尔比耶极限赛（Verbier Xtreme）上比赛。
item.description:
📷 Swedish skier Kristofer Turdell competes during the Freeride World Tour final Verbier Xtreme in the Swiss Alps pic.twitter.com/yYQupsfJJZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 美洲人权法院就世界上污染最严重的城镇之一对秘鲁进行了谴责，这个安第斯城市拥有一个重金属冶炼厂，近一个世纪以来，该冶炼厂毒害了居民和环境
item.description:
The Inter-American Court of Human Rights condemned Peru over one of the world's most polluted towns, an Andean city which is home to a heavy metal smelter that has poisoned residents and the environment for almost a century https://t.co/Vzfaf4vt4P

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #AFP 本周图片（3 月 16-22 日）
item.description:
#AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 16-22) https://t.co/oz4x76nN2G pic.twitter.com/lF98IozCY2

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 22, 2024

item.title: 维克多-夏拉（Victor Sharrah）一天早上醒来时，发现自己眼前到处都是恶魔。感谢优秀的维克多和 @avmello_ 向我讲述这种罕见的卡夫卡式病症--前视变形症--它扭曲了人脸的外观：
item.description:
When Victor Sharrah woke up one morning he saw demons everywhere he looked.
Thanks to the excellent Victor and @avmello_ for speaking to me about this rare Kafkaesque condition - prosopometamorphopsia - which distorts how faces appear.
My story for @AFP:https://t.co/iVext8qFCW

— Dan Lawler (@DanielLawler) March 22, 2024

item.title: 狗是否真的能听懂我们说的话，而不是像语气和上下文线索这样的东西，这个问题一直困惑着狗的主人，到目前为止，科学还无法给出明确的答案。
item.description:
Whether dogs truly understand the words we say -- as opposed to things like tone and context clues -- is a question that has long perplexed owners, and so far science hasn't been able to deliver clear answers.https://t.co/AmbjimQK37 pic.twitter.com/cPZvve43P5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：肯德基创始人桑德斯上校的塑料雕像一直是日本棒球迷的幸运符。但在大阪阪神老虎队最近夺冠后，幸运不再需要，在处理雕像之前，人们在一座寺庙举行了表示感谢的仪式。
item.description:
VIDEO: A plastic statue of Kentucky Fried Chicken's founder Colonel Sanders has been a lucky charm for Japanese baseball fans. But after Osaka's Hanshin Tigers recent win, luck no longer needed, a ritual to show gratitude is held at a temple before the disposal of the statue. pic.twitter.com/dcOHrhUIDF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔总统候选人将于周五向选民做最后的宣传，这标志着经过数周的政治危机之后，一场被认为是史无前例的选举的仓促竞选活动已经结束。
item.description:
Senegal's presidential candidates were set to make their final pitches to voters Friday, marking the end of a rushed campaign for what is considered an unprecedented election after weeks of political crisis.https://t.co/b1U8QbpfIG pic.twitter.com/nypCLjgImN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：尼日利亚西北部的一个村庄在枪手发动袭击后几乎无人居住，这是该国最近发生的大规模绑架勒索事件。
item.description:
VIDEO: A northwest Nigerian village was left nearly unoccupied after gunmen launched an attack in the country's most recent mass abduction for ransom. pic.twitter.com/XQe2hSpyAu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 法国警方周五测试了奥运火炬传递的安保计划，将部署一个由 100 名警员组成的多层包围圈，以阻止抗议者。
item.description:
French police tested their security plans for the Olympic torch relay on Friday, with a multi-layered ring of 100 officers set to be deployed to keep protesters at bay.#AFPSports https://t.co/MMywuQ3tu9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：周四，69 名罗兴亚难民在印尼亚齐地区附近海域沉船后获救，他们紧紧抓住翻转的船体。
item.description:
VIDEO: Sixty nine Rohingya refugees, clinging to the upturned hull of a boat, were rescued at sea on Thursday off Indonesia's Aceh region after their ship sank. pic.twitter.com/GGJPgEkxwa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING#利比亚乱葬岗发现至少 65 具移民尸体：联合国
item.description:
#BREAKING At least 65 migrants' bodies found in mass grave in Libya: UN pic.twitter.com/0WAytx70ZD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯和中国周五在安理会否决了一项由美国主导的关于加沙停火的决议草案，莫斯科指责华盛顿没有向以色列施压，是 "虚伪的表演"。
item.description:
Russia and China on Friday vetoed a US-led draft resolution at the Security Council on a ceasefire in Gaza, with Moscow accusing Washington of a "hypocritical spectacle" that does not pressure Israel.https://t.co/t9OcQ9sxA5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：在印度南部小镇 Somwarpet，当地人庆祝被称为 "Thyyam "或 "Kaliyattam "的传统舞蹈节。这种仪式结合了戏剧、哑剧和崇拜，是南印度最古老、最著名的仪式之一。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the southern Indian town of Somwarpet, locals celebrate the traditional dance festival known as 'Theyyam' or 'Kaliyattam.' The ritual combining theatre, mime and worship is one of South India's oldest and most prominent rituals. pic.twitter.com/pWnMteIRMA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Netanyahu says told Blinken Israel will go into Rafah even without US support.
item.description:
#BREAKING Netanyahu says told Blinken Israel will go into Rafah even without US support pic.twitter.com/Zk4vzkfQiE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周五在萨尔巴赫（Saalbach）举行的世界杯总决赛上，瑞士超级障碍赛选手马可-奥德马特（Marco Odermatt）和拉拉-古特-贝赫拉米（Lara Gut-Behrami）双双获得速度项目的榜首。
item.description:
There was double Swiss super-G delight at the World Cup finals in Saalbach on Friday as both Marco Odermatt and Lara Gut-Behrami finished atop the speed discipline's standings.#AFPSports https://t.co/mLNuUsa7Ge

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：新西兰老人聚在一起喝茶，完成一项重要任务：DIY 制作有朝一日他们自己使用的棺材。
item.description:
VIDEO: Elderly New Zealanders meet for cups of tea and a task of grave importance: building DIY caskets that they will one day use themselves. pic.twitter.com/s8o90zXoD1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 联合国的一份报告周五警告说，世界需要更好地管理淡水资源，但如果不加以控制，被吹捧为解决方案的饥渴新技术可能会导致 "严重问题"。
item.description:
The world needs to better manage its freshwater resources but thirsty new technologies touted as solutions could lead to "serious problems" if left unchecked, a UN report warned Friday.https://t.co/nj2YCqZi9A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：时隔近三十年后，一个因描述制裁下的残酷生活而被萨达姆-侯赛因禁止播出的伊拉克电视节目重回荧屏。"瓦希巴的世界 "是伊拉克的一个节目，主要关注吸毒、犯罪、离婚和失业等社会问题。
item.description:
VIDEO: After nearly three decades, an Iraqi TV programme banned by Saddam Hussein for its gritty depiction of life under sanctions has returned to screens. "Wahiba's World" is an Iraqi show focusing on social issues such as drug addiction, crime, divorce and unemployment. pic.twitter.com/7SDvrAuVVN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024
